name: SAPMI DEFENDER
description:
My first game. Made in 2016 as a protest to the mining industries ongoing plans to exploit our nature in the north of Sweden.

Thanks to Dimitrios for the awesome music:

https://soundcloud.com/dimitrios-karatzios

Instructions:

Hard to learn, easy to master :)

Click/tap to throw a molotov cocktail. Build a combo and use the bonus-ravens for sick scores.
